Row.Text: Cultural Attribute Skills
+1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per Age on the Palace and City Halls.
+10%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing Wonders.
+25%[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture towards studying Civic Masteries.
+10%[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture in Cities with at least 1 Wonder.
+1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture in Settlements for each Resource assigned to them.
+1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per Age from Great Works on display.
+1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture from Specialists, or +2 if you have 3 or fewer Cities.
+10%[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every Alliance you have.
+1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per Age in Towns, or +2 in Distant Lands.
+5% total[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. Repeatable.
Diplomatic Attribute Skills
+1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness per Age on the Palace and City Halls.
+1[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence per Age on the Palace.
+1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in Settlements for each Resource assigned to them.
+50%[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence towards initiating and progressing the Befriend Independent Action.
+25%[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence towards supporting or rejecting Diplomatic Actions.
+50% Celebration length.
+2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science per Age for each City-State you are Suzerain of.
+1 Social Policy slot.
Unlock the Military Sabotage Espionage Action.
+3% towards all yields for every Alliance you have. Repeatable.
Economic Attribute Skills
+1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold per Age on the Palace and City Halls.
+2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold per Age for every active Trade Route.
+2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every Tech and Civic Mastery completed in an Age.
+1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every imported Resource.
+15%[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold towards purchasing in all Settlements.
+1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on Resources in Towns, or +2 in Towns in Distant Lands.
+1 Resource Capacity in Cities, or +2 if you have 3 or fewer Cities.
+10%[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every Alliance you have.
+1 Resource Capacity in Towns.
+5% total[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. Repeatable.
Expansionist Attribute Skills
+25%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Settlers.
+5% Growth Rate in Cities.
+1[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food per Age on Warehouse Buildings.
15% of[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food is refunded when a City grows by adding a Specialist.
Gain +1 Population in Towns. New Towns start with an additional Population.
+10%[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food and[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness towards maintaining Specialists, or +20% if you have 3 or fewer Cities.
+15% Yields in Towns with a Specialization, or +30% in Distant Lands.
+1 Specialist Limit in all Cities, -1 Settlement Limit.
+1 Settlement Limit.
+1[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food in Cities per Town. Repeatable.
Militaristic Attribute Skills
+5 Combat Strength against Independent Powers and City-States.
Gain 1 free War Support on all your wars.
+50%[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence towards Levying Units from City-States.
+15%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Military Units.
Ignore the [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness penalty from Unrest in captured Settlements.
Garrisoned Commanders reduce[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness penalties by an additional 10%.
-1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold maintenance for all Units.
+1 Settlement Limit.
Commanders gain a free Level. New Commanders start with a free Level.
Units receive +2 HP when healing. Repeatable.
Scientific Attribute Skills
+1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science per Age on the Palace and City Halls.
+15%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing Buildings.
+25%[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science towards researching Tech Masteries.
+20%[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness towards maintaining Buildings.
+1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science in Settlements for each Resource assigned to them.
+1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on each Quarter.
+1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on Specialists, or +2 if you have 3 or fewer Cities.
+10%[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science for every Alliance you have.
+1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science per Age in Towns, or +2 in Distant Lands.
+5% total[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. Repeatable.
